title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing limbs in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a party in a dream in detail, occasions differ and vary according to the situation in which the person wants to celebrate, and parties have been found, which are one of the reasons for happiness and comfort in the heart of a person of different races and ages, as they bring together loved ones and friends together. These parties have multiple and different indications that we will come to in this article to explain the interpretation of the dream of seeing a party in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a party in a dream in detail for a single woman Seeing a party in a dream indicates many clues and interpretations cited by dream interpretation scholars, and seeing a party in a dream generally indicates a new emotional relationship, and there are many indications of this. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a party in a dream in detail for single women: If you see a party in a single woman's dream, this means that her life will change for the better. Also, if an unmarried woman sees a party in a dream, this means that she will achieve many of the goals she seeks. Since seeing a birthday party in a single woman's dream indicates that it will be a happy year for her. Also, if an unmarried woman sees a party and invites her friends to it, this is evidence of her imminent engagement. Also, seeing a party in an unmarried woman's dream indicates the girl's excellence in her studies. While seeing a party in a single woman's dream means that she will achieve her goals after fatigue and problems. Also, if an unmarried woman sees that she is preparing for her wedding, this indicates that she is free from problems And crises. Seeing preparations for a party in a dream means sadness and distress in a girl's life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pebbles and stones for the most famous interpreters in detail Seeing a party in a dream for singles Parties are happy things in real life, which differ from one person to another, according to the many details contained in the dream, and here are the most important things mentioned in the interpretation, Seeing a party in a single woman's dream: If an unmarried woman sees a party in a dream, this is a sign of good news that the girl will hear. Also, seeing a party in a single woman's dream without music indicates a happy occasion in her upcoming life. Dreaming of a party indicates the great success that the dreamer will achieve in her upcoming life. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees herself attending an engagement party or a wedding, this heralds her official engagement. While seeing a single woman's party in a dream indicates her happiness and happiness in the coming days. Likewise, if the party is accompanied by music or the party includes dancing, this is a sign of distress and anxiety in the fortuneteller's life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the imam in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream A party without music Real parties are equipped with music that gives the attendees a feeling of joy and happiness. The appearance of a party without music in a dream has many interpretations that scholars have included. Here are the most important ones that came: Interpretation of a dream of a party without music: If an unmarried woman sees a party without listening to music, this indicates a marriage

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a brothel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing brothels by Ibn Sirin• Interpretation of dreams for viewing brothels in a dream is evidence that the fortuneteller is very lustful and follows his instinct.• Dreaming about brothels indicates that the dreamer does not respect himself in front of others.• This dream may also indicate that the dreamer is being deceived by someone around him • Dreaming about brothels may also indicate that the dreamer is a person who depends on the women in his life. Interpretation of seeing brothels for Nablus: Seeing brothels in a dream indicates that the dreamer thinks a lot about the bad deeds he committed in the past. Seeing adultery with a woman in a brothel It can be of great benefit to the fortuneteller. Dream of a brothel for single peopleIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is committing adultery in a brothel, this indicates her desire to get married. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is trying to attract a man to a brothel, this indicates The problems that she will fall into. Interpretation of a dream about forgiveness for a married woman. If a married woman sees inside the dream, her adultery in brothels indicates the exploitation she is exposed to by some people in her life. Seeing a married woman in brothels and some people practicing prostitution shows that she has made some right decisions about things. In her life. But if she sees that she is trying to seduce a man in the dream, this indicates her divorce from her husband. A dream about a brothel for a pregnant woman. Prostitution in a brothel in a dream is evidence of betrayal. But if she sees that she is committing adultery in brothels, this indicates that she is cheating on her husband. Seeing a brothel For a man, seeing a man committing adultery in a dream and in brothels, this indicates Hajj in the near future. However, if a man sees in a dream that he is committing adultery with an unmarried woman, this indicates that he will use his money in the appropriate place and make a lot of money. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference Refer to the social status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Peaches in a dream for married, pregnant and single women

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to the website for interpreting dreams and expressing visions. This meeting concerns the interpretation of a dream about peaches or seeing peaches in a dream. In this article, we will discuss the most important things mentioned in dream interpretation books about this fruit. The sources authorized in this article are the book (The Great Interpretation of Dreams by Ibn Sirin) and the book Al-Ta’tir by Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, both of which are essential. References in the interpretation of dreams or peaches in a dream. First: What is the meaning of peaches in the Arabic language? Peach in the language is the plural of peaches and its synonym is peaches, which is a fruit tree from the pink family of fruit trees. Interpretation of peaches or peaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The peach tree was mentioned in the chapter Forty-third of the book (Interpretation of Big Dreams) in the chapter: Seeing fruit trees, orchards, vines, etc. Ibn Sirin says: Peaches out of season indicate distress or distress. It is said in the interpretation: Peaches or sour peaches in a dream show fear or panic, and peaches in dreams represent a brave or courageous person who judges among people in good faith, with a lot accumulated on him. Of money in his youth. Interpretation of a dream about peaches or peaches in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Peaches were mentioned in the book (Ta’tir Al-Annam fi Interpretation of Dreams by Al-Nabulsi), where he said: Peaches in a dream, if they are sweet, indicate the satisfaction of desires, and if they are very sour, fear and anxiety appear in the dream. A peach in interpretation is a generous or wealthy person who has courage in adversity. Worries. Whoever sees in his dream that he is picking or collecting peaches, he will take money, and peaches in visions may indicate the return of goodness that he missed, and it may also be a warning of evil that the dreamer was thinking about. He was lost and left. Interpretation of peaches or peaches in a single girl’s dream. Peaches in an unmarried girl’s dream are praiseworthy unless they are sour or rotten. If an unmarried woman sees that she is buying them from the market and finds them ripe and available, this is a sign of fulfillment of desire. If an unmarried girl sees that someone is giving her peaches and his or her appearance is happy, then this joy in the heart will soon come true, if the person is known or close. Or that the color of peaches is red or colored, and it is unacceptable in the interpretation for peaches to appear black or yellow. But if an unmarried woman sees that she has large quantities of peaches or peaches, then this is a sign of abundance of money, and distributing peaches indicates spending and generosity, and receiving them as a gift It is considered a good omen. Patience or integrity of the dreamer in general, and peaches are also worthy of praise for those girls who saw them as if they were preparing them, making them, eating them or even offering them to guests. Peaches in the interpretation can indicate news according to the condition and appearance of the peaches. Yellow or green peaches may symbolize unripe To fear or anxiety, and the vision may be an expression of individuals’ fears about some matters, especially those related to the future. Interpretation of peaches or peaches in a married woman’s dream. Healthy peaches in a married woman’s dream indicate sustenance or money. If she sees that she is buying them from the market, this is a sign of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of dreams about marrying a Christian woman in a dream differs from an unmarried girl from a married woman, from a pregnant woman, and many dream interpretation experts have worked hard to clarify these interpretations, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian woman in a dream In a dream, if an unmarried girl sees that she is marrying a Christian, then this vision can be evidence for her of goodness, happiness, and abundance, and this vision includes many other interpretations, and here we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of marrying a Christian in a dream is also: If the unmarried girl dreams that she is marrying a Christian. This dream is evidence of the imminent date of this girl’s marriage to a man who does not follow the teachings of the Islamic religion. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees that there is a Christian groom among her relatives, it indicates that he will do something prohibited. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees a Christian in her dream and meets him. This indicates that person’s entry into Islam. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing utensils in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Seeing a Christian person in a single woman’s dream. Many of the dreams that we have in the dream are strange dreams and draw the dreamer’s attention to search for the connotations and meanings they contain. Some of them carry positive connotations and others The other carries negative interpretations, and in this paragraph we will explain the vision of a Christian person in a single woman’s dream, that is: If an unmarried woman dreams of marrying a Christian. It is a dream that indicates that this girl will enjoy success and money in the near future. Likewise, if she sees that there is a Christian woman entering her house. It shows that they will reach the highest positions in life. Likewise, if he sees that he entered a Christian’s house and asked him for things. Good skin indicates that she will marry a good man in the near future. But if a girl sees herself shaking hands with a Christian in a dream, it indicates that they They will receive an abundance of good and great sustenance. See also: Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream for unmarried and pregnant womenInterpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian in a pregnant woman’s dreamAs the dreams that we see in a dream are usually different in interpretations, and in the interpretations they contain, and the difference is based on The viewer's situation, seeing a Christian man in a pregnant woman's dream includes many interpretations. , and various connotations, and in the paragraph we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of marrying a Christian in a pregnant woman’s dream is also: If a pregnant woman sees a Christian in a dream. This dream is evidence that she will give birth to a male child. Likewise, if a pregnant woman dreams that she is marrying a Christian. It is a sign that she She will be associated with this man. While if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is in church, Christianity is also present. It appears that she will give birth to a male child. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a mute and deaf person in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of seeing a Christian in a dream for a man, as this vision includes a group of Different interpretations and interpretations, based on the scenes we see in the dream and the situation

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about getting money according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about acquiring money: Seeing money in general in a dream is considered one of the dreams that portends the acquisition of many good things. The dreamer enjoys abundant material gains and possessions, and if he sees money in a dream, it is a good sign. Also, we will learn all these details together in the following article... So follow the interpretation of the dream of acquiring money. If the dreamer sees that he is receiving banknotes in a dream, it symbolizes the good news that he will receive, changing his situation for the better and improving his sense of comfort. If the dreamer sees that he is taking money from Someone knows him and that there is enmity between them, this is a positive sign of reconciliation and getting rid of the quarrel that broke out between them. Seeing receiving coins in a dream indicates bad things that hinder the progress of insight and the many obstacles that he has faced recently. The Google Dream Interpretation Secrets website contains many interpretations and questions from fans Which you can view: Interpretation of the dream of obtaining money by Ibn Sirin. Sheikh Ibn Sirin told us that seeing money in a dream means legitimate profit and great goodness that the dreamer will enjoy in his life with the permission of the Lord. He added that this dream indicates relief from distress, ending disputes, and his ability to find solutions to the problems he faces. If the monarch willingly takes money from someone he does not know, or steals it, this leads to his negligence in performing his religious duties and his lack of interest in performing duties on a regular basis. Interpretation of a dream about obtaining money for single people: Seeing an unmarried woman obtaining money in a dream means that she will get married. From a good man who wants her well and will make her live a very happy and good life. In the event that the dreamer receives banknotes in a dream, it is interpreted that he is receiving a lot of money from someone he knows in reality. It can be an inheritance, a reward at work, or a gift from a parent. Taking coins in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the appearance of some disturbances in her life, which are disturbing her life, but she is strong and able to get rid of those bad reasons that make her feel frustrated. Interpretation of a dream Getting money for a married woman: For a married woman to get a lot of money in a dream, it is fortunate that she will enjoy a happy life with many luxuries, and God will increase it with His grace, with His permission. If a woman’s sister gets money from her husband in a dream, this indicates the extent of friendly understanding. Which prevails in their relationship and his strong desire to please her constantly. When a married woman obtains a lot of money in a dream, but she obtains it and does not care about it, it is interpreted as a spendthrift who does not take God into account in the money she spends, and she must be careful and manage matters. She buys. Interpretation of a dream about receiving money for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman receiving money in her dream is a good omen for the benefits that the dreamer will receive in reality, and that she will obtain a lot of money from where she does not expect it, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees that she is receiving coins in a dream, this This means that she is in a completely bad psychological state

title: What is the interpretation of seeing lions in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of lions in a dreamLions in a dream The lion is considered a predatory animal and it is not preferable to see it in a dream, as it is one of the visions that causes a lot of anxiety and panic to its owner. There are many interpretations of seeing the animal in a dream, which differ depending on the state of the fortuneteller, whether he is male, female, single, or pregnant, and also depending on the condition of the fortuneteller. The form in which it came, and through this article, we will learn about the most famous interpretations and meanings that arise when you see lions in a dream. Interpretation of lions in a dream for men: If he sees a man in a dream who is calm and obedient to him, and the dreamer feels that he is tamed, then it is a good dream and its interpretation is praiseworthy, as appears from By receiving great benefit. It is also said that it is an indication of the fulfillment of the desires and ambitions that the dreamer sought for long periods of his life. And if he sees the son of a lion and what is called a cub, and the person is married, this is evidence that his wife will soon give birth to a good son. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, a specialized Egyptian Google website In the interpretation of dreams. Black in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of black in a dream as evidence of his strong personality, which makes him able to achieve anything he wants with great ease without giving up. If one sees the color black in his dream, this is a sign of his promotion in his workplace. In recognition of the great efforts he is making to develop it, this will earn him everyone’s respect and appreciation. In the event that the dreamer sees black color during his sleep, this indicates that he will receive a lot of money from the back of his work, which will be very prosperous in the coming periods. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with Black denotes his ability to achieve many desired goals and as a result he will be very proud of himself. If a man sees the color black in his dream, this is a sign of positive changes that will occur in many aspects of his life, with which he will be very satisfied. Black in a single woman’s dream: Seeing An unmarried woman in a dream about lions means that she will receive a marriage proposal from a person with great power and influence and she will be very comfortable in her life with him. If the dreamer sees lions in her dream, this is a sign that she will achieve many things that she has always dreamed of and this will make her very happy. In the event that The dreamer saw the color black in her dream, this expresses her excellence in her studies to a great extent and her obtaining the highest grades that makes her family very proud of her. Seeing the dreamer in her dream with black symbolizes her gaining a distinguished position in her workplace, which will contribute to her self-realization and gaining respect Everyone and their appreciation. If a black girl sees in her dream, this is a sign that she has achieved her desire after a long period of continuous efforts to achieve it. Black in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream with black means that she will receive a very important promotion in her workplace that will help in her Significantly improving his social status. If the dreamer sees the color black during his sleep, this is a sign that he will be able to...
preview.text: Interpretation of lions in a dream Lions in a dream The lion is considered a predatory animal and it is not preferable to see it in a dream as it is one of the visions that cause a lot of anxiety and panic for its owner. There are many interpretations of seeing the animal in a dream that differ according to the condition of the fortune teller if he is male or female or single or pregnant and also depending on the form in which it came and through this article we will learn about the most famous interpretations and meanings that arose when you saw lions in a dream. Interpretation of lions in a dream for men If he sees a man in a dream and he is calm and obedient to him and the dreamer feels that he is tamed, then it is one of the good dreams and its interpretation is commendable, as it appears through his receiving great benefit. It is also said that it is an indication of the fulfillment of the desires and ambitions that the dreamer has sought for long periods of his life. And if he sees a lion's son and what is called a cub, and the person is married, this is evidence that his wife will soon give birth to a righteous son. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, the Egyptian Google website specializes in interpreting dreams. Black in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer's vision of lions in a dream as evidence of his strong personality, which makes him able to achieve anything he wants with great ease without giving up. If a person sees the color black in his dream, this is a sign of his promotion in his workplace in appreciation of the great efforts he makes to develop it, and this will earn him everyone's respect and appreciation. If the dreamer sees the color black during his sleep, this indicates that he will get a lot of money from the back of his work, which will be very prosperous in the coming periods. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with lions indicates his ability to achieve many of the desired goals and as a result he will be very proud of himself. If a man sees the color black in his dream, this is a sign of positive changes that will occur in many aspects of his life, which he will be very satisfied with. Black in a dream Single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about lions means that she will receive a marriage proposal from a person of great power and influence and she will be very comfortable in her life with him. If the dreamer sees lions in her dream, this is a sign that she will achieve many of the things she has always dreamed of and this will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees the color black in her dream, this expresses her great excellence in her studies and obtaining the highest grades that make her family very proud of her. Seeing the dreamer in her dream with lions symbolizes her gaining a distinguished position in her workplace, which will contribute to her self-realization and gaining everyone's respect and appreciation. If a girl sees lions in her dream, this is a sign that she has achieved her desire after a long period of continuous efforts to achieve it. Lions in a dream for a divorced woman Seeing a divorced woman in a dream with lions means that she will get a very important promotion in her workplace that will help improve her social status to a great extent. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend arguing with him in reality by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a friend arguing with him in reality. Among the interpretations over which scholars have differed is that Ibn Sirin does not agree with Al-Nabulsi in some cases, as the interpretation varies depending on how the opponent appears in the dream. Or is there a bad conversation between him and the dreamer? Therefore, in this article, we will refer to the most important hundreds of interpretations of the dream of seeing a friend quarreling with him in reality, according to senior jurists. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend quarreling with him in reality. Scientists say that the interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend arguing with him in reality has many different meanings, depending on the vision of the friend and his condition, as See below:If the dreamer sees a friend quarreling with him in reality, and he looks at him without speaking, this may indicate a conspiracy against him. While the dreamer sees his partner who disagrees with him in the dream, it is a sign of peace and the cessation of hostility between them. When the dreamer sees in a dream his quarrelsome friend He accepts it, as this is a sign of feeling remorse and that the dreamer must begin peace. Jurists interpret reconciliation with a quarrelsome friend in a dream as a sign of the dreamer abandoning committing sins and keeping him away from sins. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend arguing with him in reality by Ibn Sirin Ibn Shirin says: Whoever sees a friend quarreling with him for a long time and the disagreement between them was great, this is evidence of his insistence on making mistakes in his life. If the fortuneteller quarrels with his friend in reality because of his betrayal and sees that he is reconciling with him in a dream, then he may lose his prestige and respect in front of people and suffer a great moral loss. While if the reason for the quarrel was theft, and he saw that he forgave him in the dream, he may lose a lot of money. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend arguing with him in reality about single people. In the case of a single woman dreaming of a friend arguing with her, the interpretations are as follows: Seeing an unmarried woman with a friend A quarrelsome woman in reality, talking to her normally, indicates the passing of a crisis in her life and the end of sadness. If a girl sees that she is arguing with her friend who is arguing with her in a dream, this may mean that she is freed from envy, and God knows best. Scientists say that seeing his engaged friend scolding him severely could To warn her against the failure of courtship and separation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend arguing with him in reality about a married woman. We find in the interpretations of scholars that the friend who is quarreling with him actually sees a married woman on three different occasions: If a married woman sees a quarrel with her in reality talking with her husband in a dream, then she may A heated quarrel arises between them. While the wife sees that a friend other than her is smiling at her in a dream, this indicates the return of friendship between them and tolerance for each other. The appearance of the opponent’s friend in a bad appearance in a married woman’s dream can be interpreted as saying that her husband is facing a financial crisis that affects his livelihood and is suffering from drought and distress. Interpretation of a dream Seeing a friend arguing with him in reality about a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a friend arguing with him in reality carries interpretations, both negative and positive, as we see: If a pregnant woman sees that a friend quarreling with him appears in reality in a miserable state in a dream, the vision can be interpreted as being exposed to health problems. Tj

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the mouth according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the mouth: This dream differs for men and women, but it causes a lot of stress and anxiety to the person who sees it, as removing hair from the mouth is one of the unpopular things, as the person feels disgusted at that time. . But interpretation scholars have stated that this dream refers to many symbols and connotations that vary between good and evil. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the mouth: The hair that comes out of the mouth in a dream may indicate long life and good health that the dreamer enjoys, but if the hair coming out of the mouth is very thick This means that he falls into many problems as a result of his weakness in making the right decisions. When the dreamer sees hair coming out of the mouth and at that time he feels disgusted, this means that he falls in love with the machinations of those around him who appear to him with a good face while they are the opposite, and the vision is a warning. for him. To him that he must take care. Interpretation of the dream of removing hair from the mouth by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that a person sees hair coming out of his mouth, this indicates the long life he lives, if the hair is long, but if the dreamer sees someone pulling the hair from his mouth, this means that it will fall out. In some problems, but God saved him from them. As for the dream of seeing hair in the mouth and it does not come out easily, the dreamer will be exposed to distress and fall into some difficulties and problems. Which has a website, Interpretation of Dreams Online, from Google, there are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Pluck Hair from the mouth in a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi says that seeing hair coming out of the mouth in a dream and falling out indicates the end of magic or the death of envy, and it may mean the dreamer’s long life, peace of mind, and tranquility. Al-Osaimi explains seeing long hair plucked from the mouth in a dream as an indication of many opportunities that await That person's whole life, which one should make good use of. Her life is like an engagement that was not good for her. When a married woman dreams that she is helping her husband remove the threads from his mouth, this is a sign that she is a patient wife who supports her husband in his judgment and always stands by his side until he succeeds. To get rid of his problems...in compensation, he draws closer to God and uses him for those who help and support him in this difficult period that he is going through. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the mouth for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees her hair coming out of her mouth in her dream, this indicates that some people speak ill of her. The vision also shows that this girl will encounter many problems and difficulties, but they will soon end. But if the girl sees hair coming out of her mouth while vomiting, she will fall ill but she will soon survive. When a girl sees hair coming out of her father’s mouth in... In a dream, you will soon be blessed with a good job that will lead to earning a lot of money.. An unmarried girl dreams that she has long hair coming out of her mouth, as this indicates marriage soon to a young man with good morals and she will be very happy with him.. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the mouth For a married woman: If a married woman sees...

title: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the most important jurists

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream: A prison is a building complex with many dark rooms or large wings. Confinement takes place inside the prison, either solitary confinement or confinement that includes more than one person, and in this place those who violated the laws and committed many crimes and harmed society and citizens are placed. Interpretation of a dream about prison To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Ibn confirmed You will see that seeing a sick person in his dream that he entered a prison and the prison was dark and strange, and this is evidence that this sick person will die and enter his grave soon. But if the sick dreamer sees that he is entering a prison that has a well-known shape and does not feel fear inside, this means that the period of illness will be prolonged, but God He will heal him and write it back to him. His life is complete. Health.Seeing the dreamer in a dream with a dead person known to the fortuneteller, and this dead person was wrong and sinful, and the dreamer saw him in prison, this is evidence that his place will be the fire of hell. Because he died unfaithful. But if the dreamer sees a dead person he knew, and he died in the religion of Islam, and he goes to prison in the dream, then this vision is evidence of the many sins committed by this dead person, and his deprivation of the bliss of Paradise. Because of these sins, this vision is intended to be a mercy for the dead, and to do everything that frees him from torment as charity. As Ibn al-Nabulsi said: If a sick dreamer comes out in a dream, this is evidence of his salvation from a disease that almost claimed his life. If the dreamer is imprisoned In reality, he saw in his dream that he could open the door of the cell in which he was imprisoned, or he saw in a dream that the prison door did not have a lock and opened easily, then this is evidence that he will. Soon he will be released from prison and he will enjoy his life. The same interpretation is in the case where the dreamer sees that he was sleeping in his cell and opened his eyes and found the roof of the prison without a roof and a sky. In front of him and prominent and clear stars, this is also evidence of freedom and release from prison. When the dreamer sees that he is imprisoned in one of the prisons of the ruler or sultan, this indicates that he is afflicted with evil and worries that will accompany him for long periods. When an unmarried young man sees that he is in prison, and this prison is in an unknown house For him, this vision confirms that the dreamer will marry a rich woman and get a large portion of her money. If the dreamer sees that he is inside the prison and cries without screaming, then this vision confirms comfort and a way out of hardships, and if the dreamer continues to cry inside the prison with loud screams and screams, then this is evidence of... He fell suddenly. A disaster will shock him. Interpretation of a dream about prison for single women. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is in prison in a dream, this is evidence that she will marry a man who is not like men, but he will be a man of strong authority, and her marriage to him will be happy and enjoyable. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is imprisoned in her room And inside her house, this is a sign that she will soon acquire wealth and goodness. When an unmarried woman sees that she is building a prison in her dream, this is evidence that she will interview a man of great knowledge and religion and she will receive a very large amount of income from him.
